2. "Washington" - a city and the capital of the United States.
3. "clashes" - a term used to describe violent conflicts or confrontations.
4. "September" - a month.
5. "60 Palestinians" - a number of people belonging to a particular ethnic or national group.
6. "15 Israelis" - a number of people belonging to a particular ethnic or national group.
